{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3313232,"name":"Shorya Malani","username":"shoryamalani","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/8c91f0/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-19T23:34:20.900Z","cooked":"

Hey guys,

For the past few hours we have been trouble shooting some interesting canivore behavior. We have successfully connected a can loop, licensed, and used this canivore before but halfway updating firmware on another device, it started showing red STAT and stopped responding to anything.

Here are some things that we have done to troubleshoot (all of these have been done in many configurations and many times)

  1. Replace cable
  2. unplug can
  3. try lsusb (shows nothing)
  4. connect canivore directly to pc

Where should we go from here/ is this canivore cooked?
